TwinEditor.Sharing.SynchronizationState

TwinEditor.Sharing.SynchronizationState Class Reference

This makes up the major part of a session: it provides synchronization among multiple sites, using a ISynchronizationStrategy to achieve this goal. More...

Protected Member Functions

override void ApplicationConnectionReceived (object sender, ReceivedEventArgs e)

Detailed Description

This makes up the major part of a session: it provides synchronization among multiple sites, using a ISynchronizationStrategy to achieve this goal.
